General.Name: Kovo Healthtech Corp
General.Description: Kovo HealthTech Corporation operates as a healthcare technology company. It provides various software solutions and services, including revenue cycle management and electronic health records. The company offers its solutions to medical practices and clinics, and hospitals. Kovo HealthTech Corporation is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1600 ? 925 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3L2
